response.original_title: Time Zones: The Truth behind 'The War Games'
response.overview: A documentary in which historians discuss the reality behind the various time zones featured in the Doctor Who story The War Games. The facts behind the fiction - historians discuss the reality behind the various conflicts featured in The War Games. With political historian Martin Farr, military historian Crispin Swayne, Newcastle University's Lindsay Allison-Jones, and author Susan-Mary Grant.
response.title: Time Zones: The Truth behind 'The War Games'
